## Source: ossf-package-analysis (5ed583a5499eedc41f305bc194ebf9b3abbaa80df363f15f5793126c0d40fdc4)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'bytekafka-0-15' @ 99.7 (pypi) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.
